law.catch_line: Corporate bodies and instrumentalities attached to Office of Secretary.
law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 12, sec. 20, effective June 25, 2009. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 13, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 152, sec. 13, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 50, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 27, sec. 8, effective June 21, 2001. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 221, sec. 3, effective July 14, 2000; ch. 265, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000; and ch. 287, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 83, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 154, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 339, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1984; ch. 346, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1984; and ch. 406, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 184, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1982; ch. 382, sec. 29, effective July 15, 1982; and ch. 393, sec. 20, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 295, sec. 13, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 45, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 299, sec. 8. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. II, sec. 6.
